note.p: Born in Königsberg, Prussia (now Kaliningrad, Russia) as Elisa Johanna Maria Gerhards, daughter of Wilhelm Gerhards and his wife Louise Amalia. Married Hermann August Hagen in Königsberg in 1851. In Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA, as Eliza Hagen, 1880.
Germany, Lutheran baptisms, marriages, and burials, 1500–1971 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 October 2022)
United States Federal Census 1880 (Cambridge, Middlesex, Massachusetts 427/232) (familysearch.org, accessed 2 December 2019)
